error_loading_shadings: Sorry, there was an error while loading the shadings from the backend.
place_shadings_message: Click on the map to place a new shading area.

edit_polygon.add: Click on the map to add a new point to the shading.
edit_polygon.remove: Click on a point to remove it from the shading.
edit_polygon.move: Click on a point to move it to a new position.
edit_polygon.delete_point_forbidden: The shape of this shading must contain at least three points.
